tool_description: Records audio from configured input sources to create new audio tracks with specified duration and quality settings.

configuration_id.description: Audio configuration ID from Audio Input Configurator

error_messages: Invalid configuration ID: Provide a valid configuration_id from Audio Input Configurator.
Invalid duration: Duration must be between 0.1 and 3600 seconds.
Recording failed: Check input source connection and audio levels.
Insufficient storage: Ensure adequate disk space for recording.
usage: Use configuration_id from Audio Input Configurator, specify track_name and duration_seconds. Optionally enable auto_gain and monitoring.

track_id.description: Unique identifier for the recorded track

file_path.description: File system path to the recorded audio file

peak_level.description: Peak audio level recorded in dB
